mapper.select:
select
from oa_employee where is_del = 0
code like concat('%',replace(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
name like concat('%',replace(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
id_card like concat('%',replace(#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
custom_code like concat('%',replace(#{customCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
limit #{start},#{rows}

select count(1); from oa_employee where is_del = 0
